subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Royal Bank of Scotland will end its sponsorship of the Williams Formula One team next year and cut in half its sports financing because of the global economic crisis. The three-year deal was worth about $14.2 million and will not be renewed when it expires at the end of the 2010 season. The bank has sponsored Williams since 2005.
